column5: Boutique style craftsman in the heart of East Austin. Just a few blocks away from the East 11th and East 6th districts. Very near downtown - a short walk or incredibly short car ride away. One of the best possible locations in Austin - close to the airport, in the middle of SXSW festivities, a short walk to the UT football and baseball stadiums, and just a stone's throw from cafes and nightlife.
column8: Boutique Style in Hip East Austin
